entities.description: A condition where adolescents experience symptoms such as changes in sleep, energy, eating, ability to keep their mind on things, and feeling badly about themselves.
The length of time these problems lasted, specifically two weeks or longer.
The time when depression symptoms were the worst, including the age when this period started.
Feelings of sadness, emptiness, or being depressed most of the day nearly every day during the worst period.

relationships.description: Indicates the symptoms associated with adolescent depression, such as sleep, eating, energy levels, ability to concentrate, and self-esteem.
Relates the depression to the length of time these symptoms lasted.
Indicates the time period when depression symptoms were the worst, including the respondent's age at that time.
Describes the feeling of being sad, empty, or depressed most of the day nearly every day during the worst period.
